events.message: The candidate John Doe has submitted his application for the Software Engineer position, including his updated resume and cover letter detailing his development experience.
John Doe's application has been categorized under Engineering due to his background in software development and relevant engineering skills.
Recruiter Alice Smith has been assigned to manage John Doe's candidacy for the software engineer position and will coordinate the next steps.
Alice conducted the initial screening call with John Doe, discussing his software development experience and assessing initial fit for the engineering role.
John responded promptly with additional information about his experience with devops tools, expressing enthusiasm for the role and willingness to proceed.
A technical interview has been scheduled for John Doe on 2024-05-07 at 15:00 UTC to assess his coding skills and knowledge of software engineering principles.
